rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {FIT1044, FIT1047} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit will cover wireless network standards relevant for mobile devices, as well as the ubiquitous integration between different network types. This includes network architectures, operational techniques and functions of the infrastructural components used in these networks. Attention will be given to the Internet of Things, with specific reference to implementations in different kinds of organisations.
